name: CASE_REG_SPEC_TEXT
description: This table stores any additional information about the regulatory special needs for the case.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPEC_NEED_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: This item stores any additional information about the regulatory special needs for the case.
